Nothing Strange Here

Nothing Strange Here is a cozy mystery adventure where players step into the shoes of an investigative journalist in the quirky town of Larcenest Gap. As the Lead UI/UX Designer and Programmer, I am responsible for bridge the gap between complex creative tools and a relaxing player experience. My work focuses on developing intuitive systems that allow players to capture, edit, and document their journey through a highly personalized lens.

Unity, C#
